sentences.en: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes or until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 在预热过的烤箱里烤25分钟，或烤成金黄色。

sentences.en: Drop the slices into the oil and fry until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 将切片倒进油里，煎至金棕色。

sentences.en: Hanson's golden rule is to add value to whatever business he buys.
sentences.cn: 汉森的成功原则是不论收购什么样的企业都要使其增值。

sentences.en: He stood there in a cocoon of golden light.
sentences.cn: 他站在那儿，一柱金光笼罩着他。

sentences.en: He was gently caressing her golden hair.
sentences.cn: 他深情抚摸着她的金发。

sentences.en: He wasted a golden opportunity when he missed from the penalty spot.
sentences.cn: 他罚球没有命中，浪费了一个绝佳的机会。

sentences.en: If you remember these three golden rules you won't go far wrong.
sentences.cn: 记住这三条金律，就不会错到哪儿。

sentences.en: If you're lucky, a splendid golden eagle may soar into view.
sentences.cn: 幸运的话，会有一只光彩夺目的金雕飞入你的视野。

sentences.en: Imagine long golden beaches where you can wander in solitude.
sentences.cn: 想象一下那长长的金色海滩吧，在那里你可以独自徜徉。

sentences.en: In the light from the hall, her hair had a golden gleam.
sentences.cn: 在大厅灯光的照射下，她的头发闪着金色的光芒。

sentences.en: Not a strand of her golden hair was out of place.
Orange and khaki flatter those with golden skin tones.
sentences.cn: 橘黄色和卡其色能衬托那些金黄色皮肤的人。

sentences.en: She chopped off her golden, waist-length hair.
sentences.cn: 她剪掉了她那齐腰的金发。

sentences.en: She combed and arranged her golden hair.
The golden bangles on her arms clashed and jingled.
sentences.cn: 她手臂上的金手镯丁零当啷地响。

sentences.en: The golden rule is never to clean a valuable coin.
sentences.cn: 重要的原则是决不清除贵重硬币上的污垢。

phrases.tran_cn: 中庸之道；[美]黄金分割（等于golden section）
金科玉律；指导原则；黄金法则

trans.tran_cn: 金（黄）色的，金质的，美好的
trans.tran_en: having a bright yellow colour like gold
